database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Lambert_AP_SWATH_P93_VS7_CDK4_expanded_mutants
entry.description: This submission is part of the mass spectrometry datasets for the manuscript by Lambert et al. that describes the use of SWATH to rapidly monitor differential interactomes. This submission contains 10 SWATH files and 5 IDA files for the following baits: CDK4 WT, CDK4 R24C, CDK4 R24H, CDK4 N41S and CDK4 N52N. Two biological replicates for each bait were analyzed by SWATH, and one of the biological replicates was used for IDA. See the README file within "Methods and Protocols" and the accompanying File description. Additional details and files are found on prohits-web.lunenfeld.ca.
